subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Shannon Scott scored 13 points and sparked a decisive second-half run as No. 10 Ohio State defeated No. 17 Marquette, 52-35 on Saturday.
snippet: Shannon Scott scored 13 points and sparked a decisive second-half run as No. 10 Ohio State defeated No. 17 Marquette, 52-35 on Saturday.
